title.rendered: STEDI LED LIGHT BAR BRACKET TO SUIT RHINO RACK PLATFORM V2.0

content.rendered:
LED Light Bar mounts to suit the new and old style Rhino Rack Platform. Registered Design 202012672

DETAILS

 

New 2020 Version 2 Design: Our new May 2020 release bracket fits Rhino-Rack Platform both new and old variants.

We may be a little biased, but we think this is the sleekest Rhino Rack™ LED Light Bar mounting solution on the market. Designed by STEDI to specifically to suit the Rhino Rack™ Pioneer Platform. This is the only solution on the market that is 100% bolt-on.

KEY PRODUCT FEATURES

  • Manufactured using 4mm thick stainless steel.
  • The powder-coat is a textured finish which precisely matches the tone and texture of the Rhino Rack™
  • The light bar mounting points are slotted allowing height optimization of the light bar.
  • Ability to slide the mounts backward and forward along the platform channel.
  • Mounts lights directly below the Rhino platform
  • Add-on front mount plate allows the light bar to sit in front of the Rhino Rack™

SUITS THE FOLLOWING RHINO RACK™

  • Pioneer Platform 4 & 5 plank
  • Pioneer Tray 4 & 5 plank
  • Pioneer Tradie 4 & 5 plank

4 PLANK (OLD) – Up to October 2019

  1. A) Stand Alone: MIN 1016mm / MAX 1212mm | ST2K 16L, ST3K 40L, ST4K 80L
  2. B) Extensions Inwards: MIN 988mm / MAX 1174mm | ST2K 16L, ST3K 40L, ST3301 26L, ST3303 PRO 60L, ST4K 80L
  3. C) Extensions Outwards: MIN 1062mm / MAX 1250mm | ST4K 80L

5 PLANK (OLD) – Up to October 2019

  1. A) Stand Alone: MIN 1248mm / MAX 1340mm | ST2K 20L, ST3K 50L, ST4K 96L, ST4K 100L
  2. B) Extensions Inwards: MIN 1220mm / MAX 1312mm | ST2K 20L, ST3K 50L, ST4K 96L, ST4K 100L
  3. C) Extensions Outwards: MIN 1294mm / MAX 1388mm | ST2K 20L, ST3K 50L, ST4K 96L, ST4K100L

4 PLANK (NEW) – 2020+

  1. A) Stand Alone: MIN 1016mm / MAX 1184mm | ST2K 16L, ST3K 40L, ST4K 80L
  2. B) Extensions Inwards: MIN 984mm / MAX 1148mm | ST2K 16L, ST3K 40L, ST3301 26L, ST3303 PRO 60L, ST4K 80L
  3. C) Extensions Outwards: MIN 1064mm / MAX 1228mm | ST4K 80L

5 PLANK (NEW) – 2020+

  1. A) Stand Alone: MIN 1246mm / MAX 1320mm | ST2K 20L, ST3K 50L, ST4K 96L, ST4K 100L
  2. B) Extensions Inwards: MIN 1214mm / MAX 1284mm | ST4K 96L
  3. C) Extensions Outwards: MIN 1294mm / MAX 1366mm | ST2K 20L, ST3K 50L, ST4K 96L, ST4K100L

GOOD TO KNOW

Keep in mind that the distance between the underside of the Rhino Rack™ and your vehicle roof will vary from make and model. Before committing to purchase we recommend you cross-check dimensions of the light bar against the clearance available on your specific vehicle.

STEDI Designed & Manufactured: This product is not endorsed by, directly affiliated with Rhino Rack™. All product and company names are the registered trademarks of their original owners. The use of any trade name or trademark is for compatibility and reference purposes only and does not imply any association with the trademark holder of their product brand.

SPECIFICATIONS

 

MATERIAL Stainless Steel
FINISH Textured UV Stable Powder Coat
SUITS All Rhino Rack Platforms

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x LH Under Mount LED Bar Bracket to suit Rhino Rack
  • 1 x RH Under Mount LED Bar Bracket to suit Rhino Rack
  • 1 x Set of Front mount Light Bar addon plates
  • 4 x M8x18mm button head bolt
  • 10 x M8 flat washer
  • 2 x M8 spring washer
  • 4 x Nylon nuts
  • 2 x M8 Channel nuts
  • 2 x M8x20mm pan head bolt

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI LED LIGHT BAR BRACKET TO SUIT RHINO RACK PLATFORM V2.0

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
